item.title: By: Joe Campbell
item.dc:creator: Joe Campbell
item.description: I had the same question as Jason Delgado. Looking forward to the next post.
item.content:encoded: I had the same question as Jason Delgado. Looking forward to the next post.

item.title: By: Jason Delgado
item.dc:creator: Jason Delgado
item.description: Just finished watching the debate and was curious about the doma/charisma distinction... then you left this cliffhanger :D
item.content:encoded: Just finished watching the debate and was curious about the doma/charisma distinction… then you left this cliffhanger ðŸ˜€

item.title: By: Joel
item.dc:creator: Joel
item.description: I respect your love and honor of God's Word Dr. Waldron. Thank you for your humble example to all of us. It was great seeing you again at the debate brother! I am glad I was there and glad I was able to talk to few men about CBTS.
item.content:encoded: I respect your love and honor of God’s Word Dr. Waldron. Thank you for your humble example to all of us. It was great seeing you again at the debate brother! I am glad I was there and glad I was able to talk to few men about CBTS.
